```{r}
#Loading Phases 1 and 2 data.

Phase1_Sig_And_Pert <- get(load(file = "/media/data/jaume/LINCS_Raw/PhaseI/Phase1_Sig_And_Pert.Rda"))

Phase2_Sig_And_Pert <- get(load(file = "/media/data/jaume/LINCS_Raw/PhaseII/Phase2_Sig_And_Pert.Rda"))

Drugs_All <- get(load(file = "/media/data/jaume/DrugBank/Data/Drugs_All.Rmd"))
pubchcomp <- unlist(Drugs_All$`PubChem Compound`)
pubchcomp_phase1 <- Phase2_Sig_And_Pert$pubchem_cid
intersect(pubchcomp,pubchcomp_phase1)


View(Drugs_All)


length(intersect(unlist(Drugs_All$`PubChem Compound`),Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$pubchem_cid))
length(setdiff(unlist(Drugs_All$`PubChem Compound`),Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$pubchem_cid))
length(setdiff(Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$pubchem_cid,unlist(Drugs_All$`PubChem Compound`)))

intersect(Drugs_All$SMILES,Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$canonical_smiles)
length(setdiff(unlist(Drugs_All$SMILES),Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$canonical_smiles))
length(setdiff(Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$canonical_smiles,Drugs_All$SMILES))
head(Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$canonical_smiles)
head(Drugs_All$SMILES)

unique(Drugs_All$inchikey)

intersect(unlist(Drugs_All$inchikey),Phase1_Sig_And_Pert$inchi_key)
```
